{"id":626504695,"lang":"java","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1642997387,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/626504695/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"44.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int check(int[][] grid,int i,int j){\n        if(i<0 || i>=grid.length || j<0 || j>=grid[i].length || grid[i][j]==0){\n            return 0;\n        }\n        grid[i][j]=0;\n        int temp=1;\n        temp=temp+ check(grid,i+1,j);\n        temp=temp+ check(grid,i,j+1);\n        temp=temp+ check(grid,i-1,j);\n        temp=temp+ check(grid,i,j-1);\n        return temp;\n        \n    }\n    public int maxAreaOfIsland(int[][] grid) {\n        int max=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<grid.length;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<grid[i].length;j++){\n                if(grid[i][j]==1){\n                    max=Math.max(max, check(grid,i,j));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return max;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
